title: Who was voted off Strictly last night?
text:
Strictly’s Halloween week results show was all treat (Pictures: BBC)

Strictly Come Dancing lost another couple this week.

Strictly’s Halloween week was already dramatic with the things that go bump in the night being the contestants – from Will’s worrying fall to Neil’s no-show after hurting himself.

But in true Halloween style, the victim count kept rising. Which star didn’t survive Halloween week’s cut?

Who was voted off Strictly?

Ex-Corrie star Catherine Tyldesley was the fifth star to hang up her dancing shoes.

Catherine Tyldsley was eliminated from Strictly Come Dancing (Picture: BBC)

Catherine and her partner Johannes found themselves in the bottom two alongside Mike Bushell and his dance partner Katya Jones.

After performing their routine – the Cha Cha to Steps’ Scared of the Dark – a second time, Catherine lost out in a tight vote.

When it came to the judges’ decisions, Motsi Mabuse and Bruno Tonioli chose to save Catherine.

Advertisement

Advertisement

In making her vote, Motsi said: ‘I felt a strong performance, stronger body actions, stronger leg actions.’

However, Craig Revel Horwood chose to save Mike and Katya, leaving the decision in the hands of head judge Shirley Ballas – here’s hoping fans don’t get carried away again.

When it came to making her decision, she said: ‘Well, I thought both couples really step it up a notch and this is always the most difficult decision for me, but based on a good focus, difficult content, with some really beautiful footwork… I’m going to save Mike & Katya.’

Catherine took the decision well, vowing to carry on dancing. She told Tess Daly: ‘I never thought I’d say this, I’m going to keep it up because I fell in love with it! I’ve loved every second, this man [Johannes] has changed my life!’

Last night’s episode also saw the professional dancers led a spooktacular routine to Britney Spears’ Toxic to open the show, followed by a smash performance from American-Idol-turned-Queen-frontman Adam Lambert.

He performed his latest single Superpower.

He will, he will rock you (Picture: BBC)

The series is now down to its top 10 couples, and continues next Saturday night on BBC One at 7pm.

description: Strictly Come Dancing is down to its top 10 couples but who left in the latest elimination of the series?
